stimulusHtml: Which of the following is true about the research study?

features.html: Dr. Palmer randomly assigned people who had no dancing experience to one of two groups. Each group was taught a brief dance routine. Then one group performed the new routine in front of a group of strangers. The other group performed the new routine in front of a group of stuffed animals. The number of mistakes made during the routine was counted.Â

choicesHtml: The type of dance learned is a confounding variable.
The study relied on a convenience sample.
The research study was an experiment.
The professor only collected qualitative data.
